attributes.action: Extra carriage to Barking to Gospel Oak Overground
attributes.additional_details: Over the last few years people using this route has significantly increased . We are killing each other at rush hour and is a contest to get on the overground and to get off as well. The two carriage is just not enough. Please add an extra one to have a chance to get home in time and spare us with all the frustration that this issue is causing .
